participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and responsible, he cares deeply about social issues and family values.
participant_1.background: I think it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor because they can afford it and it would help to reduce the disparity between the rich and the poor. I would love to have lunch with a koala on my ranch. I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it. I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears. I wake up early and greet my family with a wagging tail.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Creative and playful, she enjoys arts and crafts, and has a love for animals and music.
participant_2.background: I take walks with my mom and do yoga at home. I collect books to keep my reading ability sharp. I miss my cat but I love jazz. I dressed up as a cat last Halloween. I play games at the arcade, still.

content.text: What's up! How are you today?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well, too. I'm just getting over a cold, but I'm feeling better.
Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you feel better soon!
Thanks, I appreciate it!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and play games.
Cool! I like to read and play games too.
What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play video games, board games, and card games.
Oh, cool! I like to play video games too. What's your favorite game?
My favorite video game is Zelda: Breath of the Wild.
Oh, that's a great game! I love that game too.
Yeah, it's so much fun!
So, what do you like to do for work?
I'm a teacher.
Oh, cool! What grade do you teach?
I teach kindergarten.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm sure you're a great teacher!
Thanks! I try my best.
Well, I have to get going. It was nice chatting with you!
It was nice chatting with you too! Have a good night!
You too!
